trans-unit.source: Provides a control for viewing flow content in a continuous scrolling mode.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于在连续的滚动模式中查看流内容的控件。

trans-unit.source: FlowDocumentScrollViewer shows content in continuous scrolling mode.
trans-unit.target: FlowDocumentScrollViewer 显示连续滚动模式中的内容。

trans-unit.source: A similar control, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>, shows content in page-at-a-time viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: 相似的控件， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>，显示的内容在页每次查看模式下。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> and FlowDocumentScrollViewer are fixed to a particular viewing mode.
trans-unit.target: 同时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>和 FlowDocumentScrollViewer 固定为特定的查看模式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> includes features that enable the user to dynamically choose between various viewing modes (as provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode> enumeration), at the cost of being heavier weight than <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> or FlowDocumentScrollViewer.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>包括使用户能够动态各种查看模式之间进行选择的功能 (如由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode>枚举)，但代价是比的更大权重<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>或 FlowDocumentScrollViewer。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows a FlowDocumentScrollViewer control with its default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下图显示了具有其默认的 FlowDocumentScrollViewer 控件[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Basic FlowDocumentScrollViewer](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-main.png "Screenshot: Basic FlowDocumentScrollViewer") By default, a vertical scrollbar is always shown, and a horizontal scrollbar becomes visible if needed.
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照︰ 基本 FlowDocumentScrollViewer](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-main.png "屏幕快照︰ 基本 FlowDocumentScrollViewer")默认情况下，将始终显示垂直滚动条，和水平滚动条将变为可见必要。

trans-unit.source: The default [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for FlowDocumentScrollViewer does not include a toolbar; however, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsToolBarVisible%2A> property can be used to enable a built-in toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 默认值[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]FlowDocumentScrollViewer 不包括工具栏; 但是，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsToolBarVisible%2A>属性可用来启用内置的工具栏。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IsToolBarVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> is the only allowable child element for a FlowDocumentScrollViewer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>为 FlowDocumentScrollViewer 唯一允许的子元素。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>

trans-unit.source: A FlowDocumentScrollViewer element may host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>.
trans-unit.target: FlowDocumentScrollViewer 元素只能承载不能超过一个<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Cancels any current printing job.
trans-unit.target: 取消任何当前打印作业。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> level can be decreased.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>可以降低。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A> method decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A>方法降低<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>级别通过指定的量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is subject to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值受到的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A> method increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A>方法增加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>级别通过指定的量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is subject to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值受到的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*> routed command.
trans-unit.target: 执行<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*>路由命令。</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom*>

trans-unit.source: The DecreaseZoom method decreases the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: DecreaseZoom 方法减少当前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>级别通过指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A> property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法不起如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>属性返回`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"></xref> that hosts the content to be displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"></xref>承载通过显示的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"></xref> that hosts the content to be displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"> </xref>承载通过显示的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Toggles the **Find** dialog.
trans-unit.target: 切换**查找**对话框。

trans-unit.source: By default, Ctrl+F provides a keyboard shortcut for toggling the **Find** dialog.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Ctrl + F 的键盘快捷方式提供用于切换**查找**对话框。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows the **Find** dialog on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> with default UI.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示**查找**对话框中的，在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>具有默认 UI。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: FlowDocumentScrollViewer find dialog](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-find.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentScrollViewer find dialog") The default **Find** dialog includes a field for entering search text, as well as buttons for **Find Next**, **Find Previous**, and **Options**.
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照︰ FlowDocumentScrollViewer 查找对话框](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-find.png "屏幕快照︰ FlowDocumentScrollViewer 查找对话框")默认**查找**对话框包括一个用于输入搜索文本字段以及用于按钮**查找下一个**，**查找上一个**，和**选项**。

trans-unit.source: The following **Find** options are provided by default: - Match whole word only - Match case - Match diacritic - Match kashida - Match alef hamza
trans-unit.target: 以下**查找**提供的默认的选项:-只匹配整个单词的匹配大小写的匹配音调符号的匹配 kashida-匹配 alef hamza

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a horizontal scroll bar is shown.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示水平滚动条。

trans-unit.source: The IncreaseZoom method increases the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level by the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: IncreaseZoom 方法可以增加当前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>级别通过指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.target: 如果调用此方法具有无效<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>属性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> displays selected text when the control does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>当控件没有焦点时，显示所选的文本。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> displays selected text when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> does not have focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>显示所选的文本时<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>不具有焦点; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 注册的默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can iterate the logical children of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取可循环逻辑子级的一个枚举器<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator for the logical children.
trans-unit.target: 逻辑子级枚举数。

trans-unit.source: Called when a printing job has completed.
trans-unit.target: 当打印作业完成时调用。

trans-unit.source: Invokes a standard **Print** dialog which can be used to print the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> and configure printing preferences.
trans-unit.target: 调用标准**打印**对话框用于打印的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>和配置打印首选项。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] does not provide a **Print** button.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]不提供**打印**按钮。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows an example of a standard **Print** dialog.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示一个标准的一个示例**打印**对话框。

trans-unit.source: Note that the specific appearance of the **Print** dialog may vary depending on the hosting computer's configuration.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，特定的外观**打印**对话框可能会有所不同，具体取决于宿主计算机的配置。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Print dialog box](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "Screenshot: Print dialog box")
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照: 打印对话框](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "屏幕快照︰ 打印对话框")

trans-unit.source: Gets the selected content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取所选的内容的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Selection is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 选择是在.NET Framework 版本 3.5 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[版本和依赖关系](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The selected content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所选的内容的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that highlights the selected text.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置突出显示所选的文本的画笔。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the brush that highlights selected text in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> by setting the SelectionBrush and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定突出显示中选定的文本的画笔<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>通过设置 SelectionBrush 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: A brush that highlights the selected text.
trans-unit.target: 突出显示所选的文本的画笔。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the opacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>的不透明度

trans-unit.source: If you set the SelectionOpacity to 0, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> is transparent and is not visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 0，设置 SelectionOpacity<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>是透明的并且不可见。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the SelectionOpacity to 1.0, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A> is opaque and the selected text is not visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 1.0，设置 SelectionOpacity<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>不透明，所选文本是不可见。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush%2A>

trans-unit.source: The opacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionBrush*>的不透明度

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.4.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0.4。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.SelectionOpacity*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*>属性来添加<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"></xref>作为有关的内容子级<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Document*>

trans-unit.target: 要作为子级添加的对象。

trans-unit.target: 要添加到对象的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a vertical scroll bar is shown.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示垂直滚动条。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current zoom level.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前缩放级别。

trans-unit.source: The zoom level is constrained by the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 值约束的缩放级别<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MaxZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.MinZoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The current zoom level, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 当前缩放级别，以百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: The default is 100.0 (a zoom level of 100%).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 100.0 （100%缩放级别）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zoom increment.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的缩放增量。

trans-unit.source: The zoom increment is the percentage by which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A> level is increased or decreased when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> commands are executed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 缩放增量是依据百分比<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>级别增加或减少时<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A>执行命令，分别。</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.DecreaseZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.IncreaseZoom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The current zoom increment, interpreted as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 当前的缩放增量，解释为一个百分比。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.0 (zoom increments by 10%).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 10.0 （缩放增量为 10%）。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.ZoomIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer.Zoom*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
